Module hanyaeger.api
Package com.github.hanyaeger.api.engine

Interface Activatable

All Known Subinterfaces:
YaegerScene
All Known Implementing Classes:
DynamicScene, SplashScene, StaticScene, TileMap
public interface Activatable
Implementing Activatable denotes the Object can, and usually must, be activated before it can be used. The Activatable interface has tight connections to the Initializable interface, with the main difference that Initializable.init(Injector) requires an Injector as its parameter and should thus be used to bring an Object into a valid state. A Activatable can then be used to set the behaviour of such an Object.

  • Method Summary

    Modifier and Type Method Description
    default void activate()
    Lifecycle method used to perform activation of this Game Object.

  • Method Details

    • activate

      default void activate()
      Lifecycle method used to perform activation of this Game Object. By default this method is empty, so it should be implemented by the Game Object, if desired.
